author: Pitch Meeting
description:
Step inside the pitch meeting that led to Beast Games!

Subscribe for more Pitch Meetings: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Kq-yEt1iYsbUzNOoIRK0g

Mr Beast dominated YouTube, getting all the subscribers and all the views that a person can get. Now he’s set his sight on some other eyeballs: those of Amazon Prime viewers. This guy’s got a lot of eyeballs on him, is what I’m saying.

Beast Games definitely raises some questions. Like why was there a need for so many contestants? Is this show just bribing people to leave the show? Did they really have to build a city to play with some red balls? 

To answer all these questions and more, step inside Ryan George’s Pitch Meeting for Beast Games!


Check Out These Other Videos:

title: Beast Games Pitch Meeting
